alert.note: Alert for Bailey; Cochran (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 16 at 6:27PM CDT until May 16 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lubbock Texas has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Bailey County in northwestern Texas... Cochran County in northwestern Texas... * Until 730 PM CDT. * At 627 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles northwest of Bledsoe, or 18 miles west of Morton, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Morton, Bledsoe, Muleshoe Wildlife Refuge, Bula, Enochs, Lehman, Maple and Whiteface. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
